entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
